DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare survival patient recurrent refractory pancreatic cancer treatment nitrocamptothecin versus fluorouracil . II . Compare clinical benefit objective response rate treatment regimens patient . III . Compare evaluate time treatment failure patient treatment regimen . IV . Compare toxicities treatment regimens patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , open label , multicenter study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive nitrocamptothecin orally day 1-5 . Arm II : Patients receive fluorouracil IV 30 minute day 1 . Treatment repeat weekly 8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients tumor regression stabilization may receive additional course treatment . Patients disease progression unacceptable toxicity may crossover alternate treatment arm . Patients follow every 3 month one year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 400 patient ( 200 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 15 month .
